level.heading: Applicability of chapter.
level.text: This chapter shall apply upon the inclusion of its fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 2(b)(1) of the Wage Theft Prevention Correction and Clarification Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-544, Dec. 29, 2014, 62 DCR 243, 20 STAT 4458).

For temporary (90 days) addition of a chapter prohibiting employers from testing potential employees for marijuana use during the hiring process, see §§ 2 and 3 of the Prohibition of Pre-Employment Marijuana Testing Emergency Amendment Act of 2014 (D.C. Act 20-525, Dec. 18, 2014, 61 DCR 13112, 20 STAT 4441).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-132
level.text: For history of Law 19-132, see notes under § 32-1361.
